template.description: NiFi template to create process group to parse logger data from CSV file and save the data to database and also route flow to Kafka based on some condition.
template.name: logger_data_parsing_template

entry.value: Simply logging unmatched or failed flow file at row number : ${fragment.index:toNumber():plus(1)} of file ${filename}
Data published to Kafka of Temperature value : ${value} of file ${filename} at row number : ${fragment.index:toNumber():plus(1)}
Unmatched flow files(based on type and value).
